description: The Skytour Kit is for backcountry skiers and snowboarders who tour higher and further. Streamlined, function-first design and lightweight AscentShell™ 3L stretch fabric make them perfect for human-powered adventures.
name: Outdoor Research Skytour AscentShell Bibs - Mens
